alert.note: Alert for Knox; Sullivan (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 07 at 12:04PM EDT until May 15 at 8:00PM EDT by NWS Indianapolis
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Indiana...Illinois... Wabash River at Hutsonville Legacy Power Plant Site, Covington, Lafayette, and Montezuma. ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Indiana... Illinois... White River at Edwardsport. Wabash River at Riverton and Terre Haute. .Recent rainfall had lead to minor flooding along the Wabash and Lower White Rivers in Indiana. Flooding may continue into next weekend for some sites. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL SUNDAY, MAY 15... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Wabash River at Hutsonville Legacy Power Plant Site. * WHEN...Until Sunday, May 15. * IMPACTS...At 18.0 feet, Seep water occurs behind levees on Indiana side. Hutson Creek begins to overflow from backwater. Old Darwin Road and a few rural roads in eastern Clark and Crawford counties in Illinois are impassable. Low agricultural land floods. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - There is no current observed data. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 18.2 feet Thursday morning. It will then fall below flood stage Sunday, May 15. - Flood stage is 16.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/ind. This statement will be updated within the next 12 to 24 hours.
